response.answer_text: AHHH, another math question! the answer is 6/10! Have a great day, though I think you should know this if you are a grown dude that is having a good life and is able to access Quora!  xD lol xD IM JOKING, Okay, that one was a lie! it would be 1.666666666 repeated, and would look like this online! 1.6666666667 for the notice that it goes on forever!

10 divided by 6 is, in fact, one. But there is a remainder of four and that is where it starts to get interesting. Or put another way, you can only take six items from a group of 10 identical items once. We abstract by pretending that a fractional amount of six items could still be taken from the remaining 4. What a big step that is though.
